This strange place lies detached from the rest of reality,
connected only by the spindles from which immortal beings
are the only ones who may traverse them. The doorway is a
massive stone arch of traditional dwarven masonry, though
with a touch of elven style, as suggested by the means by
which the edges are broken and notched to coincide with a
single neighboring block of stone. The doorway is made of
hard wood, thick and coated in oil to protect it from the
elements.  It rests on four massive iron hinges and locks
with two mechanisms of gnomish design. The crest of House
Brightmantle is carved upon the keystone, and beneath the
dual torchposts which forever remain burning are crumbled
statues of dragonkind.  An iron ring sits hinged upon the
door as a knocker, though immortals have no need for such.{x

description:
It is not like the other summoned creatures, but rather an intruder
into their home.  This cavern bandit wants nothing more than to
plunder their riches and otherwise ruin their delicate way of life.

This mage doesn't seem to belong here, though the other creatures
don't seem to mind his presence.

He is a strong titan even as titans go.  Perhaps the offspring of
the elder herself, he walks proudly about with no intention of leaving
this place.

He is a short warrior as far as humans go.  It is uncertain whether

this village.

This stout orc is all muscle and no brains.  He towers over the
other wandering folks as if to say "mess with me if you can", though
his mental capacity cannot finish that sentence, so he opts for
grunting and waving his club.

M greet 8113 30~
M death 8119 8~

He is a proud pixie heavily armored and ready for whatever
adventure lies on the horizon, though he is also as good natured as
his other brethren.

M greet 8114 25~
M death 8120 8~

description:
It is a mighty golem made from mist.  You can see right through it,
but make no mistake about it: this golem is through and through tough
as they get.
8115.name: {cA {MM{mis{Mt {gG{yo{wl{ye{gm{x~

description:
He is young, but not a boy.  Tall, but not overbearing.  Kind, but
not creepy.  He is Dugmaren's mortal servant, the armorbearer.  Bid
him a request and he will grant it.
8116.room_name: A servant of the Brightmantle House stands here.
8116.name: an immortal servant~

description:
She is beautiful, though diligent in her task.  Nothing shall
distract her from her mission of watching the village.  Despite her
duty, she tires of the loneliness and welcomes any visitors with a
smile, as long as their intentions are genuine.
8117.name: {cA {CV{Gi{wl{Wl{wa{Gg{Ce {MW{matchguard{x~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
He is very young and of one of the mist beings who's race is not
readily identifiable.  Part flesh and part aether, as the race of
espers, he perpetuates a smile upon his likeness as he sits upon the
stool working on a stone with great concentration.  He looks up only
briefly to acknowledge your presence.

description:
He is a young titan boy, tall for his age even for a titan.  He
wears traditional titan clothes of loosely fitting sheets tied with
banded leather straps.  On his nose is a pair of thick spectacles that
seem a little too large even for him.  No doubt his height becomes
useful for when the bookkeeper needs books from the top shelf.

8119.name: the {wb{8ookkeeper's {Ca{cssistant{x~

This is a dense cloud of mist which seems to be sentient--no doubt

It's an imp, though this one is red, unlike your garden variety
green imp.  Must be some strange result of being summoned...

This is a beautiful golden sylph common only among callers and
summoners who choose such warm companions.  Garbed in cloth, it looks
similar to a pixie, though a bit larger and more angelic.

8126.d_flags: D {cspins to the ground in agony.{x~

It is a beautiful sylph of bright green color.  This is the only
place you have seen such a creature as this, and no doubt it is a rare
find.
8126.name: {wAn {GE{gm{8e{wr{8a{gl{Gd {WS{My{ml{Mp{Wh{x~

description:
It is a beautiful sylph of bright purple-blue color.  Such
wonderful gem sylphs can only be found here, as they are the construct
of the girl who once lived among them.

No doubt the most beautiful of these sylphs, this star sylph is
much larger and shines with a bright color that give it the name.  It
may also be the stronger of the sylphs, so do take care.
8128.name: {wA {WStar {WS{My{ml{Mp{Wh{x~

This watcher is invisible and impervious to attack.  Only immortals
may see it.

description:
It is a short figured wrapped in a thick cloak of rags.  In the
darkness, it seems rather sinister, though it makes no sudden moves to
alarm you.  There are trinkets and charms of various kinds around its
neck and arms and ankles, or what you assume to be its ankles and
arms, since they are concealed.  More interesting than the way it
looks is the fact that it can speak.  Hear now what it has to say.

description:
Yearning to be one with mist, Baravor is tormented from being cast
out of the world it once knew.

description:
He is a short...  Thing, vaguely transparent, and somewhat pudgy
around the midsection.  By best accounts, he is of the race of espers,
and NO, he DOES NOT serve esper juice.  He has a fine selection of
drinks, at affordable prices, though money is, after all, beyond the
concern of immortals.  Still it is a quaint way of getting something,
for seemingly something, as is the way of mortals.  And to top it all
off, he takes requests (though it may take some time for the airship
traders to get it to this place, after all, it is beyond mortal
realms).
8133.room_name: A {Wd{wrink {Rs{rteward {xstands here, serving drinks to the immortals.
8133.name: the {Wd{wrink {Rs{rteward{x~

description:
He is an elder gentleman, well dressed and sporting a smile from
ear to ear.  He is very welcoming to visitors for this house, but more
interesting is that he is one of the immortal servants, such that his
mortality is pardoned for his tenure here in the spindles.
8134.room_name: A halloween shopkeeper stands here selling his goodies.
8134.name: halloween shopkeeper~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
He is an old, human mage who seems crippled from the years and
hardly able to defend himself.  He is happy to live here among these
fascinating creations, though you have to wonder what he does for food
and other necessities.

description:
She is the first elder of mist, though at a glance, she looks to be
no more than 40 years of age.  A human, no doubt, with long, black
hair and clear eyes that seem mysterious in the shadows.  She is
sitting at the center of the circle half meditating, and perhaps
waiting for you to walk in.

description:
Of all the creatures to put in a cave, a bird seems to be the last
option, but this raven was summoned here nonetheless.  Moon ravens are
a unique species, with dark vision and keen senses, so perhaps these
birds were intended as scouts to protect this place from intruders.
8160.name: {xA {yM{boo{yn {8Raven{x~
subroutines:
F aff T
F off F

8161.d_flags: D {ctwitches violently and falls to the ground.{x~
description:
This owl is a natural creature of the night, though not a native to
caves, which makes its presence here quite unusual.  Being a summoned
bird does have its perks, such as heightened senses and longevity
that's perhaps a great incentive for being in less than hospitable
conditions.
8161.name: {xA {gB{ra{gnd{re{gd {yO{ww{yl{x~
subroutines:
F aff T
F off F

8163.d_flags: D {ccollapses to the ground in a lifeless heap.{x~
description:
This is the largest of the summoned birds, and is perhaps the most
fitting for being in these caves.  As legend goes, these strange birds
can summon powerful earth magic upon its enemies.
8163.name: {xA {cC{go{Cc{Gkt{Cr{gi{cc{x~
subroutines:
F aff T
F off F

description:
This is a medium sized creature, covered in hair that seems to be
unique to these caves.  Though only three to four feet in height, it
stands on two legs and looks to be quite stout.  It has a head that
resembles a wolf or bear, but without the long snout, making it truly
interesting.
8164.name: {xA {rH{ya{8l{mr{8e{mn{8b{yo{rn{x~

description:
This unusual creature is very thin with dark, leathery skin and two
large eyes, not unlike that of a mantis.  Its limbs protrude far from
its body, which isn't much thicker than them.  Of all the creatures
you have encountered thus far, this is perhaps one of the oddest.
8165.name: {xA {cR{re{cv{8el{cl{re{cr{x~

description:
It has the build of a small pixie, but otherwise is nothing like
one.  Three sets of wings alternate beats to keep this creature in
flight.  It has four legs, of which two seem to also be arms.  Its
head is far removed from its body with a long neck and scales instead
of skin.  A pair of antennae protrude from its head and it moves with
quick, sporadic motions.
8166.name: {xAn {BEi{8ge{wn{8fo{Brm{x~

description:
It is similar in build to an upright cave bear, but without the fur
or the snout.  This nirvanos is a distant relation to the mindflayers,
with a limited mental attack, but without the tentacled face or
elaborate robes.  Being a summoned creature, it is bound to this place
wheter it prefers to or not.
8167.name: {xA {GN{yi{wr{gva{wn{yo{Gs{x~

description:
It is a sprite born of fire.  As far as sprites go, they are no
unlike pixies, but a bit larger and much more aggressive.  Alone, a
sprite is an easy enemy to defeat, but they often attack in swarms,
downing their foes quickly and without mercy.
8168.name: {xA {yF{Ri{Yr{Re {MS{mp{Rri{mt{Me{x~
subroutines:
M death 8109 3~
M death 8115 10~

description:
It is a sprite born of the element water.  Sprites are an
interesting race of beings.  Though there are few left in the world,
they exist mainly as called being that are brought for the
entertainment of the summoner, though they do make a formidable army
when equipped and trained.
8169.name: {xA {CW{ca{Wt{ce{Cr {RS{rp{Mri{rt{Re{x~
subroutines:
M death 8109 3~
M death 8115 10~

description:
This sprite is born of the element wind.  It is the fastest of the
elemental sprites, though very vulnerable to attack when hit.  In war,
these sprites are the scouts and occasionally used to bewilder
opponents with their hit and run tactics.
8170.name: {xA {WW{win{Wd {mS{Mp{rri{Mt{me{x~
subroutines:
M death 8109 3~
M death 8115 10~

description:
This sprite is the largest of the elemental sprites.  It is of the
element earth and can barely fly due to its size, but it is also the
brute force attacker of the group.  When provoked, it will come after
its enemies relentlessly.
8171.name: {xAn {yE{8a{rr{8t{yh {rS{Rp{mri{Rt{re{x~
subroutines:
M death 8109 3~
M death 8115 10~

description:
Born of all four elements and only at the whim of its own brethren,
this sprite is the most feared, and perhaps beloved of the elemental
sprites.
8172.name: {xA {GQ{8ui{wnt{Wes{wse{8nc{Ge {RS{Mp{Bri{Mt{Re{x~
subroutines: M death 8109 75~

description:
It is one of the sylphs, but you are unsure which one.  With
downbeaten wings, it circles aimlessly about, as if lost.  You can't
help but feel a bit sorry for it, though if only a tiny bit.
8173.room_name: {wA {8Lost {WS{My{ml{Mp{Wh{x flys about aimlessly in the caverns.
8173.name: {wA {8Lost {WS{My{ml{Mp{Wh{x~
